A

App - Class in edu.odu.cs.cs350
App is the main class that gets everything done- reads the arguments, creates a website class, calls the analysis function, then calls the output function.

callOutput(Website) - Static method in class edu.odu.cs.cs350.OutputPackager

For Command Line Interface Output, currently only used to output json, text, and excel file names

H

htmlExtractor(String) - Method in class edu.odu.cs.cs350.Page
HTML Extractor extracts anchor tags/links and classifies links as intra-page, intra-site, or external - Extracts Image tags and classifies as internal/external images - Extracts file size for each image, the URI for each image, and local pages on which it is referenced

OtherFile - Class in edu.odu.cs.cs350

output(String, String, String) - Static method in class edu.odu.cs.cs350.CLI
 
OutputPackager - Class in edu.odu.cs.cs350
The purpose of OutputPackager is to call the JSON, Text, Excel, and CLI output functions and output .JAR file with completed code and 2 executables (Windows and Linux/OSX) Also possibly outputs errors to CLI if not caused by user (if caused by user, that output is handled by Website class
OutputPackager() - Constructor for class edu.odu.cs.cs350.OutputPackager
